title: Igor Danchenko Charged With Lying in Calling Business Group Official a Trump Dossier Source
sub_head: Russia analyst is accused of misleading FBI about his relationship with Sergei Millian, who was president of the Russian-American Chamber of Commerce
body:
A Russia analyst who fed information to the author of a salacious dossier about Donald Trump lied to federal investigators about his interactions with a business-group official he said was a source for the document, according to an indictment unsealed Thursday.
The analyst, Igor Danchenko, is accused of lying about his contacts with Sergei Millian when the latter was president of the Russian-American Chamber of Commerce in the USA, the indictment said. The indictment doesnâ€™t name Mr. Millian, but he is identifiable from the context.
